title: Renovated 2 Bedroom on 3rd Floor
map_address: 3481 S Fenton St near W Hampden Ave
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 977 Sq.
Come home and relax at Velo Apartments, quiet, recently renovated apartments in Lakewood.

Our pet friendly, bright and spacious one and two bedroom apartments feature redesigned interiors with tasteful details such as hardwood style flooring, walk in closets, and contemporary kitchens with shaker style cabinetry, new countertops, stainless steel appliances and gorgeous tile backsplashes.
Additionally, every apartment boasts a washer and dryer, central heat and air conditioning, a wood burning fireplace, and a private patio or balcony with scenic views.
Only 12 miles from Downtown Denver, you can enjoy the perfect balance of suburban living and city conveniences in Lakewood, CO at a price that won’t break the bank.
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
